title: Tainted Love II (The Tainted Love Trilogy-
description: At four, I was abducted.At seventeen, I escaped.At thirty, I’m learning to tie my shoes and visiting a damn shrink once a week.Don’t get me wrong, these headshrinker visits aren’t for me.I do it for Vixen, my badass survivor of a wife.The woman is a saint for loving my sinful ass. She never once judged me for the things I’ve done in the name of survival.She wants me to confront my past and heal from the pain, or some such nonsense.I’ll tell my story—for Vixen and our daughter.Word of warning though. You might want to cover your ears when we venture into hate-f*ck territory.Because there, I really shine.TRIGGER This book contains highly sensitive subject matter in reference to child abduction. READER DISCRETION ADVISED. 18+
author: R&C Christiansen
